${modID}:Memory.NAME: Memory
${modID}:Memory.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard up to !M! cards. NL Draw that many cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Dual Claw.NAME: Dual Claw
${modID}:Dual Claw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Dual Claw cards by !M! this combat. NL ${modID}:Echo.

${modID}:Dizzying Strike.NAME: Dizzying Strike
${modID}:Dizzying Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Dazed to your hand.

${modID}:Omnipotent Form.NAME: Omnipotent Form
${modID}:Omnipotent Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].
${modID}:Omnipotent Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:Forget the Pain.NAME: Forget the Pain
${modID}:Forget the Pain.DESCRIPTION: Add a Wound and a Forget to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.NAME: Well-Laid Plans
${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card.
${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

${modID}:Memory Palace.NAME: Memory Palace
${modID}:Memory Palace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card during combat, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Extra Turn Spell.NAME: Extra Turn Spell
${modID}:Extra Turn Spell.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. NL Draw 2 fewer cards at the start of that turn. NL End the turn. NL Exhaust.
